Apply Eye Makeup: Using cosmetics to enhance the eyes.
Apply Lipstick: Using lipstick to color the lips.
Baby Crawling: A baby moving on hands and knees.
Balance Beam: Performing gymnastics on a narrow beam.
Baseball Pitch: Throwing a baseball to a batter.
Basketball Dunk: Scoring by dunking the ball in basketball.
Bench Press: Lifting weights while lying on a bench.
Billiards: Playing the game of billiards or pool.
Blow Dry Hair: Using a blow dryer to dry hair.
Bowling: Rolling a ball to knock down pins.
Boxing Punching Bag: Punching a heavy bag for boxing practice.
Boxing Speed Bag: Hitting a small speed bag for boxing practice.
Clean And Jerk: Lifting a barbell from ground to overhead.
Cliff Diving: Jumping off a cliff into water.
Cricket Bowling: Throwing a ball in the game of cricket.
Cricket Shot: Hitting a ball in the game of cricket.
Cutting In Kitchen: Chopping or slicing food in the kitchen.
Drumming: Playing a drum or set of drums.
Field Hockey Penalty: Taking a penalty shot in field hockey.
Front Crawl: Swimming using the front crawl technique.
Golf Swing: Swinging a club to hit a golf ball.
Hammer Throw: Throwing a heavy weight in athletics.
Handstand Pushups: Performing pushups while in a handstand position.
Handstand Walking: Walking on hands while upside down.
Head Massage: Rubbing or kneading the head to relax.
Horse Riding: Riding a horse for sport or leisure.
Hula Hoop: Spinning a hoop around the waist.
Jumping Jack: Jumping with legs and arms spread.
Jump Rope: Skipping rope for exercise or fun.
Kayaking: Paddling a small boat called a kayak.
Knitting: Making fabric by interlocking yarn with needles.
Mopping Floor: Cleaning the floor with a mop.
Nunchucks: Practicing with nunchucks for martial arts.
Playing Daf: Playing the daf, a type of drum.
Playing Dhol: Playing the dhol, a double-sided drum.
Playing Tabla: Playing the tabla, a pair of drums.
Pole Vault: Jumping over a high bar with a pole.
Pommel Horse: Performing gymnastics on a pommel horse.
Pull Ups: Pulling the body up using a bar.
Rafting: Navigating a raft on a river.
Rock Climbing Indoor: Climbing on artificial rock walls indoors.
Shaving Beard: Removing facial hair with a razor.
Shotput: Throwing a heavy metal ball in athletics.
Sky Diving: Jumping from an aircraft and parachuting down.
Soccer Juggling: Juggling a soccer ball with feet and knees.
Soccer Penalty: Taking a penalty kick in soccer.
Swing: Moving back and forth on a swing.
Table Tennis Shot: Hitting a ball in table tennis.
Tai Chi: Practicing slow, controlled movements in Tai Chi.
Tennis Swing: Swinging a racket to hit a tennis ball.
Volleyball Spiking: Hitting a volleyball over the net.
Writing On Board: Writing on a chalkboard or whiteboard.
